    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static <T> IServiceHolderManager<T> newInstance(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context,
                                                       java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                       java.lang.String nameOfId)
        Creates a new IServiceHolderManager object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the service to be hold
        Parameters:
        context - a bundle context bound to the service holder manager for getting services.
        clazz - the class of services to be managed
        nameOfId - the name of the service property used as the service ID
        Returns:
        a service holder manager
